section.title: Overview
section.p: This API retrieves information about the Task run with the specified Runtime ID.

row.entry:
Returns Task run information at the specified level of detail.
Summary – Returns less detailed information.
Detail – Returns more detailed information.
Summary
If true, the Pipeline increments tha API meter. ???
If the Task was triggered by a parent Pipeline, the key-value pairs of parameters passed to this Task. ???
